contact.summary:
Missions matter to me. I am enthusiastic about the opportunities to work with you to build a healthier world, participate in an informed society, and ensure future generations thrive. For more than two decades, I have led operations focused on building healthy, informed communities, and am currently leading Acres U.S.A., the Voice of Eco-Agriculture.

My approach to business is simple: Never stop looking for ways to improve. Outwardly, we have to always improve our products, distribution and marketing. Inwardly, we have to always improve in how we treat our people, and how we live up to the values we set. When we create practical, useful systems to address both, I have found financial success, and worker retention, soon follow. 

Why am I unique? My experience working for customers to simplify and build businesses around subjects like organic fertilizers, carbon exchanges, biology-fungal relationships, energy technology, landfill reduction, and animal welfare, among many others. My background in research, media, agriculture, conservation, education and C-suite management have helped me advance my understanding of how to build ideas that unify and make real, positive changes.

profile_positions.description:
Helping regenerative farmers and ranchers create a healthier world. 

It's time to be bold. Regenerative farmers today are improving food quality, strengthening communities and empowering real change, and they are vital to helping us create a healthier world. By empowering these entrepreneurs through leadership skill-building, networking and creative problem solving, we will help accelerate change to a regenerative world. 

Our Leadership Program, set to launch in 2023, will provide a vital tool for the regenerative industry to help create a more consistent set of goals, visions and vocabulary in the movement, while ensuring farmers and ranchers are the ones to continue to lead. 
 
When you finish a Think Regeneration Leadership Academy program, you will know how to:

• Clearly and consistently communicate your regenerative system, goals and vision;
• Accurately describe the social impact of your farming or ranching system;
• Speak confidently to investors, peers, journalists, employees, and community members;
• Use tools for real-world problem solving you can apply immediately; and
• Lead and direct others clearly and effectively.

As we help farmers and ranchers achieve their goals, we will also be building a Regeneration Think Tank to create healthier humans, more resilient rural communities, and more productive ecosystems. Leveraging years of unique experience in farming, ranching, community building, eco-agriculture, and investigative journalism, Think Regeneration is truly unique in our ability to make real impact and drive awareness.

Learn more at https://www.ThinkRegeneration.com
profile_positions.title: Founder & Director

profile_positions.description:
With more than 24 years in media, conservation, and executive roles, I help mission-based companies achieve their goals through creative problem solving. What is my style? I collaborate with you and your team to execute a well-defined process that helps demystify the obstacles in the way, and create a real solution that fits your team size, personality and abilities. From operations to sales to new product launches, I can help you create and engage with an audience who is interested in learning about your values, how you are treating the environment, and how you are building a better world. 

Experience with: 

Farming | Ranching | Fertilizers | Agronomy | Soik Health | Energy | Advocacy | Conservation | Outdoor Recreation | Landfill Reduction | Water | Tourism | Media | Publishing | Events | Academia | Nonprofits

Contact me at 970-389-5218, or at ryan@think-regen.com to learn more.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description: I led the Acres U.S.A. business, including operations, P&Ls, marketing, sales, advertising, eCommerce, events, publishing, magazines and public relations. Acres U.S.A. is a 51-year-old mission-based company that educates farmers and ranchers around the world about the economic and ecological benefits of nontoxic farming practices. I founded and hosted the Tractor Time podcast, listened to by hundreds of thousands, and Eco-Ag U Online, a hub of farmer-led online courses teaching eco-agriculture practices.
profile_positions.title: Executive Director

profile_positions.description:
My role was to manage P&Ls, editorial, content, graphic design, business development, and quality control departments for multiple organizations, including The Aspen Times, Summit Daily News, Tahoe Daily Tribune, Tahoe Magazine, Vail Daily, and more than a dozen other seasonal publications and websites. 

As a newsroom and community leader, my aim was to help our local community news operations think wildly different about how to serve our customers and readers in competitive markets. In every position, my job was to create and implement baseline systems and best practices that can be applied in any market to grow readership and sales.
profile_positions.title: Executive Editor & General Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Resource Central’s goals are to tackle resource conservation issues in our community, to provide accessible and affordable conservation solutions, and to reduce the negative environmental impacts associated with non-sustainable practices. We empower our community to put conservation into action in sustainable and measurable ways.

As a head coach for South Boulder Little League, I coached a variety of teams ranging in ages from 9-12. I focus on good sportsmanship, practicing hard, playing with focus and respect, while maintaining the importance of basic fundamentals and good teamwork.
Carry-Out Caravan volunteers take orders for, shop, and deliver groceries to local elders who may be home bound or cannot otherwise shop for groceries on their own.

The National School Foundation Association is the recognized leader of the PreK-12 education foundation movement in the United States, providing training and support for their development and quest to increase student achievement through philanthropic investment and involvement.

zFull.summary:
Missions matter to me. I am enthusiastic about the opportunities to work with you to build a healthier world, participate in an informed society, and ensure future generations thrive. For more than two decades, I have led operations focused on building healthy, informed communities, and am currently leading Acres U.S.A., the Voice of Eco-Agriculture.

My approach to business is simple: Never stop looking for ways to improve. Outwardly, we have to always improve our products, distribution and marketing. Inwardly, we have to always improve in how we treat our people, and how we live up to the values we set. When we create practical, useful systems to address both, I have found financial success, and worker retention, soon follow. 

Why am I unique? My experience working for customers to simplify and build businesses around subjects like organic fertilizers, carbon exchanges, biology-fungal relationships, energy technology, landfill reduction, and animal welfare, among many others. My background in research, media, agriculture, conservation, education and C-suite management have helped me advance my understanding of how to build ideas that unify and make real, positive changes.

profile_positions.description:
Implementing Marketo for enterprise customers. 

Lead architect of Marketo Data Transfer Hub and Marketo AutoMerge. Data Transfer Hub automatically imports and exports many types of data from an SFTP site into Marketo and exports from Marketo to the SFTP site. This application is used by dozens of Marketo customers for custom integrations and exports to data warehouses. 

AutoMerge automatically merges duplicates in Marketo using a sophisticated rule set, generally within 5 minutes after the duplicates are created. It can be used for one-time deduplication and for ongoing deduplication. 

Both solutions are secure, scalable and multi-tenant, built using Serverless technology. They are proven with dozens of customers world-wide for a large variety of use cases. If you'd like to know whether this would work for your use case, please contact me at jep at adobe com.

profile_positions.description:
LeadSloth helps B2B technology companies use online marketing to increase sales. It starts with creating an overall strategy to determine which online activities will be most successful, taking into account budget and staffing constraints. We set aggressive but realistic goals, and continuously monitor progress.  

Possible activities to increase website traffic include Inbound Marketing: Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Paid search (e.g. AdWords) and Social Media. Site design, A/B testing, web analytics and personalization are used to increase conversion events, such as whitepaper downloads and trial registrations. After conversion, lead follow-up can be improved with lead management automation, such as email marketing, lead scoring and integration with your CRM system. We only focus on few of these activities at the same time, to maintain focus and ensure quick results. 

LeadSloth has extensive experience increasing online marketing results for technology companies in B2B markets such as software companies, including software-as-a-service.

Developed the Strategy and Roadmap; undertaking the situational and requirements appraisal, options scoping, solution selection, and implementation strategy. Delivered numerous technology and process changes, including: widespread migration to the Cloud; ship from store solution driving an additional £3m EBITDA; channel expansion supporting an additional £2m EBITDA; reduction of direct IT costs by 33% (c.£0.5m); initiation of project to deliver new Business Intelligence tool and Data Warehouse to drive business insight; initiation of projects to upgrade ERP system and migrate to the Azure Cloud; Microsoft Teams rollout, and implementation of robust support and issue prevention/mitigation processes.

•	Redefined governance processes and implemented Security systems for Networks (Network monitoring and a new Head Office Wifi), Server and Endpoint Security and monitoring (EPP/EDR and SIEM tools), PCI-DSS, and GDPR, to ensure/work towards compliance, including overhauling remote access and security systems across the organisation.

•	Transforming key systems and processes, including introducing ‘Pick at Store/Ship from Store’; Microsoft D365 (ERP) Discovery and Roadmap; Business Intelligence review, discovery, and solution selection; and Microsoft Teams rollout.

•	Developed Strategic solutions, situational appraisal, option scoping, solution selection and implementation strategies for: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 (ERP) CU upgrade and migration to the Azure Cloud; Till upgrade to Windows 10.

•	Defined and implemented a ‘Cloud migration’ Strategy, migrating key systems from obsolete physical infrastructure to Cloud to future-proof core infrastructure and develop Business Continuity and revamp Disaster Recovery plans.

profile_positions.description:

•	Responsible for the Strategic Roadmap for Digital Transformation; Operational Management of IT, and the Operating and Capital Budgets; working collaboratively across the business to build trust and confidence in IT, deliver improved customer service, balance the strategic vision with responding to business demands and delivering the wider Digital business strategy. 

•	Conducted a full review of IT; evaluating technology, suppliers, people, processes, and budgets, saving over 30% on the operating budget, along with further year-on-year savings as contracts were able to be reviewed and renegotiated.

•	Restructured and rebuilt the IT Team to ensure operational effectiveness; building a structure which utilises talent mapping to reward high achieving and committed staff with the opportunity for progression within the company. Created and fostered a ‘customer first’ approach to the delivery of the service.

•	Developed 3-year IT Strategy Plan to help drive Digital change and organisational efficiency, including bringing data to the heart of the organisation with the development and implementation of a new Datawarehouse and Power BI Business Intelligence system to replace the heavily bespoke and manual Excel culture and existing ZAP BI solution.

•	As part of the Senior Leadership team, undertook a review of the arrangements for Business Continuity to support Crew’s core business processes.  Took the lead within IT to ensure resilience of services, migrating key servers into the cloud; expanding the use of laptops and unified communications within the business; introducing 2FA VPN remote access.

profile_positions.description:
Transition Roadmap. Creation/ management of Operating Plan: Strategy Consultant/Board Advisor

Reporting to CEO, brought to work with the Board of Office Outlet, a Hilco Capital (Private Equity) owned company, at the start of a turnaround phase, tasked with translating the ‘Vision’ into a tangible Transition Roadmap for Change, increasing Revenue from £120m to £158m and EBITDA from -£20m to break-even. 

Created and facilitated an Executive Team ‘Strategy Day’ (+ cascade to Senior Managers); developed an Operating Plan and Transition Roadmap; identified and agreed appropriate metrics for success, obtaining Board sign-off; developed and implemented a Governance Process for change/project management, including a reporting mechanism to update the PE owners. Worked with the Board / Senior Managers to ensure all Projects were set up properly and managed to plan. At the end of the assignment, the organisation had an engaged and motivated Board and Senior Manger group with a clear set of tools, mechanisms, and plan to deliver break even EBITDA and +£38m revenue increase.

contact.summary:
🔍 Struggling to generate leads and sell out on LinkedIn? 

You're not alone. 

As a solopreneur or founder, your success hinges on your ability to stand out and convert prospects into loyal clients. 

But with a subpar profile and lackluster content, your visibility suffers, and your sales remain stagnant. 

Many solopreneurs and founders on LinkedIn struggle to optimize their profiles and create compelling content that captivates their target audience.

Without a well-optimized profile, you miss out on the visibility you deserve. Even with a polished profile, if your content fails to engage, you're unable to convert that visibility into valuable sales


That's where I come in.

I specialize in helping solopreneurs and founders like you create outstanding profiles and craft powerful content marketing strategies that generate leads and drive conversions.

How I do it: 

🌟Profile Optimization:

I ensure that your profile stands out from the competition and ranks higher in LinkedIn searches. 

I optimize your headline and summary to grab attention, craft compelling descriptions for your experience, and strategically highlight your skills and achievements.

✍️ Content Marketing Strategy:

 Once your profile is primed for success, I develop a tailored content marketing strategy that aligns with your goals and target audience.

 I conduct in-depth research to understand your industry trends, competitors, and audience preferences, enabling me to create a content plan that resonates with your target market.

📝 Compelling Content Creation:

 As a skilled writer, I create captivating and value-packed content that positions you as a thought leader.

 From engaging articles and posts to eye-catching visuals and videos, I craft content that sparks conversations, drives engagement, and generates leads. 

Together, we can develop a content calendar that ensures consistent and impactful content delivery.


📈 Results you can expect:

✅ Enhanced profile visibility and increased connections

✅ Engaging content that captivates your target audience

✅ Thought leadership positioning that sets you apart

✅ Lead generation and sales conversion success

🌟 Are you ready to take your LinkedIn presence to the next level? 

Let's connect and discuss how I can optimize your profile, supercharge your content marketing strategy, and help you sell out on LinkedIn!

profile_positions.description:
As a copywriter for an e-commerce company, I was responsible for writing compelling and informative product descriptions for various categories of products, including electronics, home appliances, fashion, and beauty. 

I worked closely with the marketing team to ensure that the copy aligned with the brand's tone and voice and communicated the benefits and features of each product effectively. 

My job was to grab the attention of potential buyers, highlight the product's unique selling points, and persuade them to make a purchase. 

In this role, I conducted extensive research on each product to understand its features, benefits, and target audience. 

I also utilized SEO techniques to ensure that the product descriptions were optimized for search engines, which helped improve the company's search engine rankings and increase organic traffic to the website.

 Through this experience, I learned the importance of crafting persuasive and engaging copy that not only informs but also inspires action. 

I also developed strong project management and collaboration skills by working closely with other members of the marketing team and adhering to tight deadlines.

Overall, my experience in copywriting for e-commerce product descriptions has equipped me with the skills and expertise needed to create compelling copy that drives sales and engages customers.
profile_positions.title: E-commerce Copywriter

You're not alone. 

As a solopreneur or founder, your success hinges on your ability to stand out and convert prospects into loyal clients.

Many solopreneurs and founders on LinkedIn struggle to optimize their profiles and create compelling content that captivates their target audience.

Without a well-optimized profile, you miss out on the visibility you deserve. Even with a polished profile, if your content fails to engage, you're unable to convert that visibility into valuable sales


That's where I come in.

I specialize in helping solopreneurs and founders like you create outstanding profiles and craft powerful content marketing strategies that generate leads and drive conversions.

 Once your profile is primed for success, I develop a tailored content marketing strategy that aligns with your goals and target audience.
